name: Lundum Dare 47 - Loney Island
description:
Explore the world around you. Try to escape the loop you are living in.

This game is a submission to the Ludum Dare 47. The theme was "Stuck in a loop"
Made with https://kyle-waldon-music.itch.io/
All the assets : music, SFX, models and scripts have been made during the jam by us.

We hope you enjoy the game as much as we did!
